content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and conveniently located. How much are you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Considering that the apartment is unfurnished and has a size of 50 square meters, I would suggest a rent of 500 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get a bit more for my property. What about 550 euros per month? This is a brand-new apartment in the city center, after all.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mister Schmidt. However, the apartment is unfurnished, and the location, while central, is not exceptional. I could go up to 525 euros per month, given its current state.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I'm sorry, but I can't go below 550 euros per month. This is a fair price for the quality of the apartment and its location. If you're not willing to pay this amount, I don't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're asking is higher than what I consider reasonable for an unfurnished apartment of this size and location.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Maryam. If you're not willing to pay 550 euros per month, then I'm afraid we won't be able to come to an agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
